summary.purpose: Provides a set of styled Popover components (root, trigger, content, anchor) built on @radix-ui/react-popover, following the shadcn/ui design pattern for floating content panels.
summary.problem_solved: Wraps Radix UI's Popover primitives with consistent Tailwind CSS styling, animation classes for open/close transitions, configurable arrow display, and data-slot attributes for styling hooks, enabling easy creation of accessible popover menus and tooltips.

external.name: @radix-ui/react-popover
external.reason: Provides the Popover primitive components (Root, Trigger, Content, Portal, Arrow, Anchor) with accessibility and positioning

external.reason: Core React library for ComponentProps type

symbols.name: Popover
symbols.description: Root popover container that wraps @radix-ui/react-popover Root with a data-slot='popover' attribute. Passes all Radix Popover Root props through.

details.rendered_ui_description: An invisible wrapper that manages the open/close state of the popover. Does not render visible UI on its own.

symbols.name: PopoverTrigger
symbols.description: The trigger element that toggles the popover open/closed state. Wraps PopoverPrimitive.Trigger with a data-slot='popover-trigger' attribute.

details.rendered_ui_description: Renders as a button (or custom child via asChild) that when clicked opens/closes the associated popover content.

symbols.name: PopoverContent
symbols.signature: function PopoverContent({ className, align, sideOffset, showArrow, ...props }: React.ComponentProps<typeof PopoverPrimitive.Content> & { showArrow?: boolean }): JSX.Element
symbols.description: The floating content panel of the popover, rendered inside a Radix Portal. Features open/close fade and zoom animations, slide-in from the appropriate side, configurable alignment (default 'center'), side offset (default 4), and an optional arrow element. Has a z-index of 1000 and a fixed width of w-72.

details.rendered_ui_description: A bordered, rounded, padded card (w-72) with shadow that animates in/out with fade, zoom, and slide transitions. Appears floating near the trigger element. Optionally displays a triangular arrow pointing toward the trigger.

symbols.name: PopoverAnchor
symbols.description: An alternative anchor element for positioning the popover content relative to a different element than the trigger. Wraps PopoverPrimitive.Anchor with a data-slot='popover-anchor' attribute.

details.rendered_ui_description: An invisible positioning element that serves as the reference point for the popover content's position when you want it anchored to something other than the trigger.
